text: On December 7, 2023, a mass shooting happened at the Bryansk school in Bryansk, Russia. One student was killed and five others were badly hurt before the shooter killed herself. The shooter was 14-year-old Alina Afanaskina. ==References== Category:2023 in Europe Category:2020s in Russia Category:December 2023 events Category:2020s mass shootings in Europe Category:2020s murders in Europe Category:Mass murder in 2023 Category:Murder- suicides in Europe Category:School shootings Category:Suicide in the 2020s Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in the 2020s Category:Attacks on schools in Europe Category:Bryansk Oblast
title: Bryansk school shooting
